說.definition: to speak; to talk; to say; to explain; to comment; to scold; to tell off; (bound form) theory; doctrine

說一不二.definition: to say one and mean just that (idiom); to keep one's word

說一千，道一萬.pinyin: shuō yī qiān ， dào yī wàn
說一千，道一萬.definition: when all is said and done; at the end of the day

說三道四.definition: to make thoughtless remarks (idiom); to criticize; gossip

說上.definition: to say; to speak; to talk

說不上.definition: to be unable to say or tell; to not be worth mentioning

說不得.definition: to be unmentionable; be unspeakable; must; cannot but

說不準.definition: unable to say; can't say precisely

說中.definition: to hit the nail on the head; to predict correctly

說也奇怪.definition: strangely enough; oddly enough; strange to say

說了算.definition: to have the final say; to be the one in charge

說你胖你就喘.pinyin: shuō nǐ pàng nǐ jiù chuǎn
說你胖你就喘.definition: lit. when someone tells you you're fat, you pant (as if you were actually fat) (idiom); fig. Hey! I pay you a compliment, and you start bragging! (typically jocular and teasing); flattery, like perfume, should be smelled, not swallowed

說來話長.definition: start explaining and it's a long story (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly

說出.definition: to speak out; to declare (one's view)

說到.definition: to talk about; to mention; (preposition) as for

說到做到.definition: to be as good as one's word (idiom); to keep one's promise

說到底.definition: in the final analysis; in the end

說合.definition: to bring together; to mediate; to arrange a deal

說哭.definition: to make (sb) cry (with one's harsh words)

說唱.definition: speaking and singing, as in various forms of storytelling such as 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2] and 相聲|相声[xiang4 sheng5]; (music) rapping

說好.definition: to come to an agreement; to complete negotiations

說定.definition: to agree on; to settle on

說客.definition: (old) itinerant political adviser; (fig.) lobbyist; go-between; mouthpiece; also pr. [shuo1 ke4]

說實話.definition: to speak the truth; truth to tell; frankly

說岳全傳.definition: "The Story of Yue Fei", biography of Song dynasty patriot and general Yue Fei 岳飛|岳飞[Yue4 Fei1]

說幹就幹.definition: to do what needs to be done, without delay

說得上.definition: can be counted or regarded as; to be able to tell or answer; to deserve mention

說得過去.definition: acceptable; passable; justifiable; (of a course of action) to make sense

說情.definition: to intercede; to plead for sb else

說文.definition: see 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]

說文解字.definition: Shuowen Jiezi, the original Han dynasty Chinese character dictionary with 10,516 entries, authored by Xu Shen 許慎|许慎[Xu3 Shen4] in 2nd century

說文解字註.definition: Commentary on Shuowen Jiezi (1815) by Duan Yucai 段玉裁[Duan4 Yu4 cai2]

說明.definition: to explain; to illustrate; to indicate; to show; to prove; explanation; directions; caption; CL:個|个[ge4]

說明書.definition: (technical) manual; (book of) directions; synopsis (of a play or film); specification (patent); CL:本[ben3]

說時遲，那時快.pinyin: shuō shí chí ， nà shí kuài
說時遲，那時快.definition: (idiom) no sooner said than done; before you know it

說書.definition: folk art consisting of storytelling to music

說曹操曹操就到.pinyin: shuō cáo cāo cáo cāo jiù dào
說曹操曹操就到.definition: lit. speak of Cao Cao and Cao Cao arrives; fig. speak of the devil and he doth appear

說曹操，曹操到.pinyin: shuō cáo cāo ， cáo cāo dào
說曹操，曹操到.definition: see 說曹操曹操就到|说曹操曹操就到[shuo1 Cao2 Cao1 Cao2 Cao1 jiu4 dao4]

說服.definition: to persuade; to convince; to talk sb over; Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]

說東道西.definition: to chat about this and that; to talk about anything and everything

說死.definition: to say definitely; to commit (to a proposition)

說法.definition: way of speaking; wording; formulation; one's version (of events); statement; theory; hypothesis; interpretation

說溜嘴.definition: to make a slip of the tongue

說漏嘴.definition: to blurt out; to let slip

說真的.definition: to tell the truth; honestly; in fact

說破.definition: to lay bare (actual facts, secrets etc); to reveal

說笑.definition: to chat and laugh; to crack jokes; to banter

說老實話.definition: to be honest; to tell the truth; to be frank

說著玩.definition: to say sth for fun; to be kidding; to joke around

說著玩兒.definition: erhua variant of 說著玩|说着玩[shuo1 zhe5 wan2]

說葡萄酸.definition: sour grapes (set expr. based on Aesop); lit. to say grapes are sour when you can't eat them

說話.definition: to speak; to say; to talk; to gossip; to tell stories; talk; word

說話不當話.definition: to fail to keep to one's word; to break a promise

說話算數.definition: to keep one's promise; to mean what one says

說話算話.definition: to do as promised; to be as good as one's word; to honor one's word; to mean what one says

說謊.definition: to lie; to tell an untruth

說起.definition: to mention; to bring up (a subject); with regard to; as for

說通.definition: to get sb to understand; to persuade

說部.definition: (old) works of literature, including novels, plays etc

說長道短.definition: lit. to discuss sb's merits and demerits (idiom); to gossip

說風涼話.definition: to sneer; to make cynical remarks; sarcastic talk
